messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 69
messages.msgSnippet: Regarding Sandra s note about only sending messages about unschooling AND emailing personally for personal stuff: Especially the personal email between just
messages.messageBody:
Regarding Sandra's note about only sending messages about unschooling AND
emailing personally for personal stuff:

Especially the personal email between just two emailers. It makes me sound
grouchy, I know, but there is just too much to wade through when people are
generally chatting back and forth and sharing it with everyone. All of our
email addresses appear on each email, so we could probably cut the number
of emails by 25% (at least) if people would do a little more private
emailing. If it's not related to UNschooling or if it's more of a personal
nature or not that important that EVERYONE see it, please reply to the
person's email address privately. Then maybe I can change back from the
digest version to the regular version!

And now I will mind my own business.


- - - - - - - -
Robin Stark
